subject: Archive the plan
description:
**Type:** Task

Steps:
1. Create folder `lisa-learn-command` in `./plans/completed/`
2. Rename this plan to a name befitting the actual contents
3. Move it into `./plans/completed/lisa-learn-command/`
4. Read the session ids from `./plans/completed/lisa-learn-command/`
5. For each session id, move `~/.claude/tasks/<session-id>` to `./plans/completed/lisa-learn-command/tasks`
6. Update any "in_progress" task in `./plans/completed/lisa-learn-command/tasks` to "completed"
7. Commit changes
8. Push changes to the PR

Blocked by task 11.
